title: plz Gnar is so weaken now!!!!
body: plz Gnar is so weaken now!!!!

replies.body: Weak? I play this guy whenever I get top and with no bias he is one of the best champions in this game. Completely underrated champion and should be played more. The amount of pressure he brings to a game is almost unmatched.

WEAK ?????

Him and Fiora are basically in every game I play top now. Once he gets black cleaver and frozen mallet hes fucking annoying and does a shit ton of damage.
once you complete Black Cleaver, His damage is insane. A good ult in teamfight and its a clean ace. Most certainly underrated.
Don't confuse the champion's balance for your total lack of experience.

I'm extremely bad at this game and I'm proud.
I've gone 1/7 as gnar before and then when Lategame comes I'm immediately at 10/7.
Gnar does not need a buff.
